menu.name: Test Dish
menu.description: This is a test dish to see if the app pulls the latest update automatically when connected to the internet.

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: Our delicious salad is served with Feta cheese and peeled cucumber. Includes tomatoes, onions, olives, salt and oregano in the ingredients.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Delicious grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Our Bruschetta includes tomato and cheese.

menu.name: Garlic Bread
menu.description: Warm, crusty bread topped with garlic butter.

menu.name: Calamari
menu.description: Crispy fried calamari served with marinara sauce.

menu.name: Grilled Fish
menu.description: Fantastic grilled fish seasoned with salt.

menu.name: Pizza Margherita
menu.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

menu.name: Chicken Parmesan
menu.description: Crispy breaded chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served over pasta.

menu.name: Lemon Dessert
menu.description: You can't go wrong with this delicious lemon dessert!

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.
